security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill file with no executable code, no network calls, no file system access, and no environment variable reads. Contains only documentation and example code snippets for reference.

content.value_statement: Creates and fixes React components for Next.js applications. Implements shadcn/ui patterns, responsive layouts, and accessible user interfaces following design system guidelines.
actual_capabilities: Creates Next.js 16 App Router pages and routes
Builds responsive layouts with Tailwind CSS
Adds workspace filtering for multi-tenant data isolation
Implements loading states, error handling, and accessibility features
limitations: Requires access to the codebase to read existing patterns
Cannot generate visual designs from scratch without references
Does not modify backend API endpoints
Cannot deploy or build the application

use_cases.title: Component Implementation
use_cases.description: Create new React components following shadcn/ui patterns and design system guidelines

use_cases.title: UI Bug Fixes
use_cases.description: Fix responsive layout issues and add proper loading and error states to existing pages

use_cases.title: New Feature Pages
use_cases.description: Build new dashboard pages with proper navigation, breadcrumbs, and data integration

prompt_templates.title: Create Component
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a new button component in src/components/ui that follows shadcn/ui patterns. Include loading state and disabled variants.

prompt_templates.title: Fix Layout
prompt_templates.prompt: Fix the dashboard layout to be responsive on mobile devices. Use mobile-first approach with md and lg breakpoints.

prompt_templates.title: Add Workspace Filter
prompt_templates.prompt: Add workspace_id filtering to all Supabase queries in the contacts page to ensure data isolation between workspaces.

prompt_templates.title: Implement Dialog
prompt_templates.prompt: Implement a confirmation dialog component using shadcn/ui Dialog. Include success toast notification and error handling.

output_examples.input: Create a new contact form page with name, email, and phone fields using shadcn/ui components
output: Added form fields using shadcn/input and shadcn/label components
Implemented form validation with error messages
Integrated toast notifications for success/error feedback
Added workspace filtering to any database queries
Implemented responsive grid layout for mobile and desktop

best_practices: Always filter database queries by workspace_id for multi-tenant isolation
Use design tokens (bg-bg-card, text-text-primary) instead of generic Tailwind classes
Implement loading and error states to prevent blank screens
anti_patterns: Using generic className like bg-white, text-gray-600, or hover:bg-gray-100
Creating uniform grid layouts without responsive breakpoints
Skipping workspace filtering on database queries

faq.question: Which React versions are supported?
faq.answer: React 19 with Next.js 16 App Router. Use Server Components by default.

faq.question: What is the component library?
faq.answer: shadcn/ui with custom design tokens. Never use default shadcn styles without customization.

faq.question: How does workspace filtering work?
faq.answer: Always add .eq('workspace_id', workspaceId) to Supabase queries for data isolation.

faq.question: Is my data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only reads files and generates code. It cannot access credentials or export data.

faq.question: Why are some CSS classes forbidden?
faq.answer: bg-white, text-gray-600, and generic patterns create inconsistent design. Use design system tokens instead.

faq.question: How is this different from a code formatter?
faq.answer: This skill implements new features, not just format code. It reads existing patterns before making changes.
